data.description: Base class for writing DBI drivers for plain
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module was formerly part of the DBD::CSV distribution but I am
    moving it into its own distribution because it is a base class for
    other modules than just DBD::CSV and to avoid confusion with the
    version of it found in older versions of DBD::CSV in Jochen
    Wiedmann's (former maintainer) directory.
